name: Garden guardin'
description:
Protect your home from malicious mushrooms, felonious frogs, and... combinations of both??

Survive all 5 waves of enemies by casting your magical spells and slowing down time to weave between enemy attacks. If either you or the house runs out of HP, you'll have to restart the wave, so be careful!

Theme: Conservation and Time Dilation.

Controls

- WASD - Move
- Click/Hold: Fire (LMB for single shot, RMB for spray shot)
- Space: Slow down time

Credits

The Marmalads

Jake Nguyen: Feudal Lord of Flora and Fauna
Robert Guan: Lead Mechanic of Mechanical Machinations
Ali Kedwaii: Warlord of Enemy Waves
Grant Ross (SoundCloud): Boss of Bodacious Beats

- Created for Magical Girl Game Jam #3 -
